name: Dissonant Psyche
description:
Play as an investigator sent to analyse the suspicious circumstances surrounding  a house belonging to a rich old man. You are armed with a flashlight and a shotgun. Delve deep into the mysteries of the house and protect yourself against an unlikely threat.

How To Play

At the top of the screen, you will find your health and an arrow. Follow the arrow for the first half of the game.  During combat, directing the flashlight towards the enemy to slow it down.

Controls

Use wasd to move., left click to shoot the gun and scroll using the mouse wheel to switch between the gun and the flashlight.
